comment._content: For anyone who's curious about Ford: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Jones_Ford There's not a whole lot to read there, but this quote made me smile: "The constitutional ideal is noble; but the politicians are vile. If only the checks could be made more effective, if only a just balance of power could be established beyond the strength of the politicians to disarrange ... the constitution would work perfectly." If only he knew...
